hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "Start build in X86" cd $WORKSPACE
echo ${CHANGE_ID}
echo "source url: ${source_http_url}" echo "source branch: ${source_branch}" echo "target url: ${target_http_url}" echo "target branch: ${target_branch}"
## fetch from origin branch if [ "${target_http_url}" != "" ]; then echo "***** git fetch *******" git config --global user.name "opengauss-bot" git config --global user.email "contact-request@opengauss.org" ##"contact-request@opengauss.org" ##git config --global credential.helper "store" git config remote.origin.url ${target_http_url} git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${target_branch} git merge --no-verify -m 'msg' FETCH_HEAD fi
##install openjdk if not exit if ! [ -x "$(command -v java)" ]; then echo "java is not installed. begin to install java..." yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 fi
##install git if not exit if ! [ -x "$(command -v git)" ]; then echo "git is not install. begin to install git..." yum install git fi
##install docker if not exit dockerId=$(ps -ef | grep docker | grep -v grep) if [ "$dockerId" == "" ]; then
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
sudo systemctl start docker fi
##build images build_version=`date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S"` project_name=website
echo "### Start build images ${project_name}:${build_version} ###" docker build -t ${project_name}:${build_version} .
echo "### Remove docker images" imageId=$(docker images | grep ${project_name} | grep ${build_version} | awk '{print $3}')
if [ $imageId ]; then echo "Build image success. ${imageId}" docker rmi -f ${imageId} else echo "Build image failed." exit 1 fi
